basic.description: Flexural design of reinforced concrete beams including singly reinforced sections, doubly reinforced sections, T-sections, and one-way slabs. Control of cracking in reinforced concrete beams as specified for design. Design of continuous beams and one-way slabs; short and slender columns; footings and retaining walls. A design project is undertaken in this course. PPE will be required for this course at student¿s cost (see course materials for details).
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Reinforced Concrete Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequiste of (CIVL 215 and CIVL330 and CIVL331) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
